items.title: Spectra Strategic Insights
items.subTitle: Nielsen, Chennai -- Frontend Middle Developer
items.description: Spectra Strategic Insights reveals the most important demographics, lifestyles and behaviors in seconds, allowing you to make decisions around your best opportunities.
ulist: To display consumer panel data in the interface by using Angular framework.
To fetch the data from db we are using spring boot.
Recently started to work on API changes to support Backend also.
Work with excel to download export the information and access the information in the offline.

items.title: Zia Search
items.subTitle: Zoho Corp, Chennai -- Frontend Developer
items.description:
Search is core of user functionality and every day users will do around 10-20 millions of searches across Zoho.

Our main purpose is to provide single user interface for searching and getting required information whether data is present in Zoho Mail, Zoho CRM, Zoho Docs, Zoho Cliq, etc, ...
ulist: User have N number Zoho applications (Zoho Mail, Zoho CRM, Zoho Cliq, Zoho Docs)
It is very difficult to remember which information are stored in which application.
If user forget required information where it is stored then user has to go each and every apps to search and find until get that required information.

SO we have planned and provide one common search interface across all zoho apps and user no need to go each and every apps or remember where the data is stored. Simply user search by keywords in that common interface in the current domain itself.
Internally we will collect user accessable services and do internal operation in all services to get data and show in the UI.

items.title: Search Admin Console
items.subTitle: Zoho Corp, Chennai -- Project  Trainee
items.description:
We have Provided user interface for handling admin related operation for Zoho Search.

By using this admin console, service team can monitor status of their data whether indexed properly or not and perform much more operation related DB to save time.
olist: We will show information about services and data to index in our DB.
Provide Retry option in UI to support to retry index if any issues occur while indexing data
Admin can delete any misleading information or junk data from UI.
Admin can add configuration properties in UI.
Admin can add and maintain scheduler in UI.
and we have added many more option in admin console to simplify service team work load.
